channel.title: Switching the wildy start position
channel.description:
Okay I made the wildy start at a position, but instead of going from 0 to 1 its goes down, to -1. I found the reason, wildy goes +1 when going north, and -1 when going south.
My question is there anyway to switch the wildy up so it goes +1 south, not north?

item.title: Switching the wildy start position
item.dc:creator: @edis1234 edis1234
item.description:
@edis1234 wrote:

I tried,

I canâ€™t make it start at lv1 wildy and head south, making it go to lv2 wildy. If anyone has solution please let me know, and it has been done before, on frostiescape

Read full topic

item.title: Switching the wildy start position
item.dc:creator: @deathschaos9 DeathsChaos9
item.description:
@deathschaos9 wrote:

You need to edit the way the levels

int level = ((absY - 3520) / 8) + 1;

Give or takes that the current one, just mess with it.

Read full topic
